our Work

ACE Radio School

ACE Radio School is an alternative form of education that provides quality education to out-of-school children through radio and listening centers. ACE Radio School has proven beneficial in bridging the educational gap, providing knowledge to out-of-school children in disadvantaged communities.

Find out moreDonate

Learning Resource Centers

Our LRCs create improved learning environments for learners and deliver flexible literacy and numeracy instructions that are responsive to the diverse learning needs and styles of learners, with a focus on children from deprived backgrounds.

Find out moreDonate

Economic Empowerment

ACE Charity equips women and young people in disadvantaged communities with vocational skills and access to finance through interest free  small-scale loans for improved income generation

Learn MoreDonate

Research & Advocacy

ACE Charity conducts quality research to provide evidence that supports our advocacy efforts geared towards ensuring inclusive and quality education for all.

Learn moreDonate
Learn More

Our Sister Charity

ACE Education is providing access to quality multilingual learning for the 21st century through transformative teacher training and leadership development.
